Package edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.pacman

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.pacman.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ghost, PacPlayer

    public abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that every character inherits from, including players and AI-controlled enemies.
    Version:
    CS56, F17
    Author:
    Dario Castellanos Anaya, Daniel Ly, Kelvin Yang, Nicholas Duncan, Wei Tung Chen
